name: Impulse Revolution
description: Impulse Revolution is a frantic, physics based racing game with an emphasis on local multiplayer. Take control of air hockey pucks in a neon-cyber world, competing in chaotic race modes and minigames, using a simple, challenging control mechanic.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 GHz Dual-Core 32-bit CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics card equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
